automatic integration of a function with a parametertwo efficient methods for automatic numericalintegration are romberg integration and adaptive simpson integration for integrands of the form f(x)g(x,a)where a is a parameter it is shown that romberg's method is more efficient a fortran programshows how to achieve this greater efficiency.cacm november 1966rabinowitz p.ca661106 jb march 2 1978 3:35 pm1040 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521352 4 13521356 4 13521883 4 13521982 4 13521982 4 13522040 4 13522040 4 13522040 4 13522040 4 13522048 4 13522048 4 13522048 4 13522074 4 13522074 4 13522074 4 13522074 4 13522093 4 13522093 4 13522093 4 13522093 4 13522415 4 13522550 4 13521040 5 13521092 5 13521241 5 13521273 5 13521352 5 13521352 5 13521352 5 1352324 5 13522040 5 1352429 5 1352570 5 1352621 5 1352786 5 1352834 5 1352872 5 13521241 6 13521273 6 13521352 6 13521356 6 1352324 6 1352621 6 1352
